name: Snowman Dude
description:
Something I made for the SECAM JAM! It is where you must create a game using the SECAM color palette. The theme for the jam was snowman.

You control snowman dude to rescue snowwoman girl from a present monster. You throw snowballs at your enemies to advance forward.

controls:

  • W,A,S, and D: Movement
  • Space Bar: To do other stuff

Features:

  • Horrible Music
  • ONE! just ONE! level
  • a SSSHHHOOORRRTTT story!
  • A boss FIGHT!
